notes: Facilities include authoritative base registry entries and deterministic generated facilities per municipality.
Stock levels are monthly snapshots to keep dataset size manageable for Electron/SQLite demo.
Epidemiology alerts are generated using a 4-week moving average rule for MALARIA and ETI_IRA.
Stock-out alerts are generated for ANTIMALARIAL items in peak months (Jun-Aug) when stock < min_level.
v2: Added TB and HIV to diseases.catalog.json and epi_weekly_2025.json; injected low-prevalence TB/HIV diagnoses into visits_2025.json.
